titles.title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 11/14/2000--Introduced. Amends the National Labor Relations Act to provide that an exception for charitable, eleemosynary, or other beneficent purposes, in the case of a published, written, or posted no solicitation or no property access rule, shall not be grounds for finding an unfair labor practice.
